text.div:
• Include these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActCode
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    RENTRentTemporary supply of a product with financial compensation, without transfer of ownership for the product.
    SALESaleTransfer of ownership for a product for financial compensation.

name: XActFinancialProductAcquisitionCode
title: x_ActFinancialProductAcquisitionCode
description: The method that a product is obtained for use by the subject of the supply act (e.g. patient), with financial compensation. Product examples are consumable or durable goods.
